title: Caressing
description: A short collection of quick but strong poems, exploring themes like sexuality, identity, and resilience."but they cannoterase meanymore"Author Ariel L. Fay delves into the human psyche and shares, in brief and powerful poems, metaphors about the most private experiences and feelings. Perfect for those who want to start their journey in the world of poetry, as well as for veterans looking for a fresh chapter. The collection begins with quasi-erotic themes, goes through moments of distress and loneliness, until it reaches a peak of self-discovery. A work that ends with a taste that leaves you wanting more.
author: Ariel L. Fay
